018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client;
019
020import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
021
022import io.opentelemetry.api.trace.Span;
023import io.opentelemetry.context.Context;
024import io.opentelemetry.context.Scope;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
029import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
030import java.util.concurrent.Phaser;
031import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
032import java.util.function.Function;
033import org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.CompareOperator;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.Filter;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.TimeRange;
038import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.FutureUtils;
039import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
040
041import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.RpcChannel;
042
043/**
044 * Just a wrapper of {@link RawAsyncTableImpl}. The difference is that users need to provide a
045 * thread pool when constructing this class, and the callback methods registered to the returned
046 * {@link CompletableFuture} will be executed in this thread pool. So usually it is safe for users
047 * to do anything they want in the callbacks without breaking the rpc framework.
048 */
049@InterfaceAudience.Private
050class AsyncTableImpl implements AsyncTable<ScanResultConsumer> {
051
052  private final RawAsyncTableImpl rawTable;
053
054  private final ExecutorService pool;
055
056  AsyncTableImpl(RawAsyncTableImpl rawTable, ExecutorService pool) {
057    this.rawTable = rawTable;
058    this.pool = pool;
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public TableName getName() {
063    return rawTable.getName();
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public Configuration getConfiguration() {
068    return rawTable.getConfiguration();
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public CompletableFuture<TableDescriptor> getDescriptor() {
073    return wrap(rawTable.getDescriptor());
074  }
075
076  @Override
077  public AsyncTableRegionLocator getRegionLocator() {
078    return rawTable.getRegionLocator();
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  public long getRpcTimeout(TimeUnit unit) {
083    return rawTable.getRpcTimeout(unit);
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  public long getReadRpcTimeout(TimeUnit unit) {
088    return rawTable.getReadRpcTimeout(unit);
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  public long getWriteRpcTimeout(TimeUnit unit) {
093    return rawTable.getWriteRpcTimeout(unit);
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  public long getOperationTimeout(TimeUnit unit) {
098    return rawTable.getOperationTimeout(unit);
099  }
100
101  @Override
102  public long getScanTimeout(TimeUnit unit) {
103    return rawTable.getScanTimeout(unit);
104  }
105
106  @Override
107  public Map<String, byte[]> getRequestAttributes() {
108    return rawTable.getRequestAttributes();
109  }
110
111  private <T> CompletableFuture<T> wrap(CompletableFuture<T> future) {
112    return FutureUtils.wrapFuture(future, pool);
113  }
114
115  @Override
116  public CompletableFuture<Result> get(Get get) {
117    return wrap(rawTable.get(get));
118  }
119
120  @Override
121  public CompletableFuture<Void> put(Put put) {
122    return wrap(rawTable.put(put));
123  }
124
125  @Override
126  public CompletableFuture<Void> delete(Delete delete) {
127    return wrap(rawTable.delete(delete));
128  }
129
130  @Override
131  public CompletableFuture<Result> append(Append append) {
132    return wrap(rawTable.append(append));
133  }
134
135  @Override
136  public CompletableFuture<Result> increment(Increment increment) {
137    return wrap(rawTable.increment(increment));
138  }
139
140  @Override
141  public CheckAndMutateBuilder checkAndMutate(byte[] row, byte[] family) {
142    return new CheckAndMutateBuilder() {
143
144      private final CheckAndMutateBuilder builder = rawTable.checkAndMutate(row, family);
145
146      @Override
147      public CompletableFuture<Boolean> thenPut(Put put) {
148        return wrap(builder.thenPut(put));
149      }
150
151      @Override
152      public CompletableFuture<Boolean> thenMutate(RowMutations mutation) {
153        return wrap(builder.thenMutate(mutation));
154      }
155
156      @Override
157      public CompletableFuture<Boolean> thenDelete(Delete delete) {
158        return wrap(builder.thenDelete(delete));
159      }
160
161      @Override
162      public CheckAndMutateBuilder qualifier(byte[] qualifier) {
163        builder.qualifier(qualifier);
164        return this;
165      }
166
167      @Override
168      public CheckAndMutateBuilder timeRange(TimeRange timeRange) {
169        builder.timeRange(timeRange);
170        return this;
171      }
172
173      @Override
174      public CheckAndMutateBuilder ifNotExists() {
175        builder.ifNotExists();
176        return this;
177      }
178
179      @Override
180      public CheckAndMutateBuilder ifMatches(CompareOperator compareOp, byte[] value) {
181        builder.ifMatches(compareOp, value);
182        return this;
183      }
184    };
185  }
186
187  @Override
188  public CheckAndMutateWithFilterBuilder checkAndMutate(byte[] row, Filter filter) {
189    return new CheckAndMutateWithFilterBuilder() {
190
191      private final CheckAndMutateWithFilterBuilder builder = rawTable.checkAndMutate(row, filter);
192
193      @Override
194      public CheckAndMutateWithFilterBuilder timeRange(TimeRange timeRange) {
195        builder.timeRange(timeRange);
196        return this;
197      }
198
199      @Override
200      public CompletableFuture<Boolean> thenPut(Put put) {
201        return wrap(builder.thenPut(put));
202      }
203
204      @Override
205      public CompletableFuture<Boolean> thenDelete(Delete delete) {
206        return wrap(builder.thenDelete(delete));
207      }
208
209      @Override
210      public CompletableFuture<Boolean> thenMutate(RowMutations mutation) {
211        return wrap(builder.thenMutate(mutation));
212      }
213    };
214  }
215
216  @Override
217  public CompletableFuture<CheckAndMutateResult> checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate checkAndMutate) {
218    return wrap(rawTable.checkAndMutate(checkAndMutate));
219  }
220
221  @Override
222  public List<CompletableFuture<CheckAndMutateResult>>
223    checkAndMutate(List<CheckAndMutate> checkAndMutates) {
224    return rawTable.checkAndMutate(checkAndMutates).stream().map(this::wrap).collect(toList());
225  }
226
227  @Override
228  public CompletableFuture<Result> mutateRow(RowMutations mutation) {
229    return wrap(rawTable.mutateRow(mutation));
230  }
231
232  @Override
233  public CompletableFuture<List<Result>> scanAll(Scan scan) {
234    return wrap(rawTable.scanAll(scan));
235  }
236
237  @Override
238  public ResultScanner getScanner(Scan scan) {
239    return rawTable.getScanner(scan);
240  }
241
242  private void scan0(Scan scan, ScanResultConsumer consumer) {
243    Span span = null;
244    try (AsyncTableResultScanner scanner = rawTable.getScanner(scan)) {
245      span = scanner.getSpan();
246      try (Scope ignored = span.makeCurrent()) {
247        if (scan.isScanMetricsEnabled()) {
248          consumer.onScanMetricsCreated(scanner.getScanMetrics());
249        }
250        for (Result result; (result = scanner.next()) != null;) {
251          if (!consumer.onNext(result)) {
252            break;
253          }
254        }
255        consumer.onComplete();
256      }
257    } catch (IOException e) {
258      try (Scope ignored = span.makeCurrent()) {
259        consumer.onError(e);
260      }
261    }
262  }
263
264  @Override
265  public void scan(Scan scan, ScanResultConsumer consumer) {
266    final Context context = Context.current();
267    pool.execute(context.wrap(() -> scan0(scan, consumer)));
268  }
269
270  @Override
271  public List<CompletableFuture<Result>> get(List<Get> gets) {
272    return rawTable.get(gets).stream().map(this::wrap).collect(toList());
273  }
274
275  @Override
276  public List<CompletableFuture<Void>> put(List<Put> puts) {
277    return rawTable.put(puts).stream().map(this::wrap).collect(toList());
278  }
279
280  @Override
281  public List<CompletableFuture<Void>> delete(List<Delete> deletes) {
282    return rawTable.delete(deletes).stream().map(this::wrap).collect(toList());
283  }
284
285  @Override
286  public <T> List<CompletableFuture<T>> batch(List<? extends Row> actions) {
287    return rawTable.<T> batch(actions).stream().map(this::wrap).collect(toList());
288  }
289
290  @Override
291  public <S, R> CompletableFuture<R> coprocessorService(Function<RpcChannel, S> stubMaker,
292    ServiceCaller<S, R> callable, byte[] row) {
293    return wrap(rawTable.coprocessorService(stubMaker, callable, row));
294  }
295
296  @Override
297  public <S, R> CoprocessorServiceBuilder<S, R> coprocessorService(
298    Function<RpcChannel, S> stubMaker, ServiceCaller<S, R> callable,
299    CoprocessorCallback<R> callback) {
300    final Context context = Context.current();
301    CoprocessorCallback<R> wrappedCallback = new CoprocessorCallback<R>() {
302
303      private final Phaser regionCompletesInProgress = new Phaser(1);
304
305      @Override
306      public void onRegionComplete(RegionInfo region, R resp) {
307        regionCompletesInProgress.register();
308        pool.execute(context.wrap(() -> {
309          try {
310            callback.onRegionComplete(region, resp);
311          } finally {
312            regionCompletesInProgress.arriveAndDeregister();
313          }
314        }));
315      }
316
317      @Override
318      public void onRegionError(RegionInfo region, Throwable error) {
319        regionCompletesInProgress.register();
320        pool.execute(context.wrap(() -> {
321          try {
322            callback.onRegionError(region, error);
323          } finally {
324            regionCompletesInProgress.arriveAndDeregister();
325          }
326        }));
327      }
328
329      @Override
330      public void onComplete() {
331        pool.execute(context.wrap(() -> {
332          // Guarantee that onComplete() is called after all onRegionComplete()'s are called
333          regionCompletesInProgress.arriveAndAwaitAdvance();
334          callback.onComplete();
335        }));
336      }
337
338      @Override
339      public void onError(Throwable error) {
340        pool.execute(context.wrap(() -> callback.onError(error)));
341      }
342    };
343    CoprocessorServiceBuilder<S, R> builder =
344      rawTable.coprocessorService(stubMaker, callable, wrappedCallback);
345    return new CoprocessorServiceBuilder<S, R>() {
346
347      @Override
348      public CoprocessorServiceBuilder<S, R> fromRow(byte[] startKey, boolean inclusive) {
349        builder.fromRow(startKey, inclusive);
350        return this;
351      }
352
353      @Override
354      public CoprocessorServiceBuilder<S, R> toRow(byte[] endKey, boolean inclusive) {
355        builder.toRow(endKey, inclusive);
356        return this;
357      }
358
359      @Override
360      public void execute() {
361        builder.execute();
362      }
363    };
364  }
365}
